subject: Technical Scrutiny of DPR - Site Inspection to verify Project Facilities proposed in Technical Schedules/DPR of each project before submitting the project for appraisal â€“ reg.
text: IRdy <4 WTTHrf xfeazrot (Tsv Gdev & FTHTf FAT4, 4RGt TrOFR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) T vi-5 & 6, Racz-10, arql; # fcrlt 110 075  G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 3MN /Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Consultancy/2022 Policy Circular No. 10.2.31/2022 dated 18th 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/SRDGQ/184/2020 (Computer No: 16046)} Sub:: Technical    Scrutiny of DPR Site Inspection to verify Project Facilities proposed in Technical Schedules/DPR of each project before submitting the project for appraisal- reg: With a view to eliminate deficiencies in project provisions & avoid/ reduce chances of Change of Scope during implementation, the following Committee shall inspect the site & verify the project facilities proposed in Technical Schedulesr DPR of each project before submitting the project for appraisal Technical Officer of HQ nominated by CGM (T), HQ PD concerned (iii) DPR Consultant (Team Leader) (iv) Peer Review Expert of DPR 2 CGM (T), HQ may issue directions on the detailed methodology to be followed during inspection by above Committee. The report of above Committee shall invariably be enclosed with appraisal note of each & every project henceforth: 3. This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority: %vslwo22 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2 . Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3. Web Admin for circulation. 'A T & M NHAI May, Copy
